title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.28 - Permission for practice landings or take-offs required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.28 - Permission for practice landings or take-offs required

State Regulations

No person shall practice aircraft landings, or
take-offs at an air terminal without permission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
